pageContext.claim: “We could change [the immigration laws] all in less than an hour. We could do -- whether it's asylum, whether it's -- any of the laws.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims it would be easy to quickly make a deal -- 45 minutes, or even as little as 15 minutes. But there is relatively little support in Congress for many of his anti-immigration proposals. When the Senate voted in 2018 on different options, Trump's plan received the fewest number of votes, including many Republican "nay" votes.
